review: While I like the functionality of the Fire TV Stick, when I first set it up I was having alot of problems in regards to freezing and stuttering with the fire stick. I had to replace the ac adapter in order to resolve the issue. Other than that issue, the stick has been fairly impressive. I especially like the self-contained nature of the device.

review: Love the compatibility with our kindle fire HDX7s. Had a minor issue the first attempt we made trying to use the mirror cast function but restarted the kindle and all was well. No issues streaming anything and loads much faster than our chromecast. All in all a great purchase after cutting the cable chord.
